Romero’s first entry into that particular camp called ‘Night Of The Living Dead’ spawned nine additional movies, as well as several popular theatrical sequels by other filmmakers. With popularity apparent, studios wanted in on this trend.

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it’s got vibes that pulls you in and reminds me of your favorite Disney princesses as Pocahontas and Mulan. And for this I think any teenage girl would enjoy it!
